article:
This is a list of 'seasons completed by the [[Buffalo Bills]] [[American
football]] franchise'. The list documents the season-by-season records of the
Bills' franchise from 1960 to present, including postseason records, and league
awards for individual players or head coaches.

:For complete team history, see [[History of the Buffalo Bills]]

*The Finish, Wins, Losses, and Ties columns list regular season results and
exclude any postseason play. Regular and postseason records are combined only at
the bottom of the list.
